summary: This module contains a collection of helper functions designed to parse Amazon book product pages. It extracts bibliographic details such as title, authors, publisher, price, availability, categories, and related metadata from the HTML, normalizes the data, and can convert it into a dictionary format suitable for Open Library catalog ingestion. Most functions are simple utilities, and many appear to be unused placeholders.
business_intent: Harvest and transform Amazon book metadata into a structured form that can be imported into the Open Library catalog, enhancing the libraryâ€™s bibliographic records with information sourced from Amazon.
